SelectDml:
SELECT PERSON_ID, first_name , last_name
 from TEST_USER.Person
SetupTempDml: declare v_sql LONG; begin v_sql:='truncate table ex8_temp_Person'; execute immediate v_sql; v_sql:='drop table ex8_temp_Person'; execute immediate v_sql; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN IF SQLCODE = -942 THEN NULL; ELSE RAISE; END IF; END;

create global temporary table ex8_temp_Person on commit preserve rows as select PERSON_ID, first_name , last_name
 from TEST_USER.Person where rownum <= 0
UpdateFromTempDml: UPDATE ( SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, c.first_name AS P_fname, c.last_name AS P_lname FROM ex8_temp_PERSON c INNER JOIN PERSON p ON c.PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID ) x SET FIRST_NAME = P_fname, LAST_NAME = P_lname
